amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to expand the definition of "major rule" to include any rule likely to result in an increase in mandatory vaccinations.
amendment.purpose: Amendment expands the definition of "major rule" to include any rule likely to result in an increase in mandatory vaccinations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 217 (Roll no. 263).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Roy.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 217 (Roll no. 263).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
